# A plugin to intergrate extra components to ONL.
#
# install-extra-pkgs.sh is the first entry called by $ONL/tools/onlrfs.py.
#
#
# Last Updated on 07 Mar, 2024
# Last Updated on 18 Nov, 2022
# Created by Hang Tsi <tsihang@asterfusion.com> on 02 Nov. 2022
#

root@localhost:$ONL/third_party/pkgs$ ls -l
total 48
drwxr-xr-x 2 root root 4096 Nov 18 02:03 bfnplatform
drwxr-xr-x 2 root root 4096 Nov 18 02:17 buster
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 1036 Nov 18 02:03 install-bfnplatform-pkgs.sh

-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 1778 Nov  4 05:16 install-os-buster-pkgs.sh
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root  946 Nov  4 05:16 install-os-stretch-docker-pkgs.sh
